sub_title: Missionary Pastor at GZB, Lecturer in Theology
summary: As a missionary pastor and theological teacher I love to reflect about God, the Bible and Christian faith, especially with young adults. I have international experience in the Christian ministry and theological education. I like to think out-of-the-box and I see my personal and professional life as an surprising adventure with God. I work focused and strategically and I have a gift for fundraising and the quality to motivate and equip teams to achieve the best of their ability. I am looking for position as pastor or theological teacher in a vibrant, orthodox, Bible believing environment.
